backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten textual summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the ArtistLeaderboardPage with global styles.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Arti: Renders a single leaderboard row with rank, name, reach score, trend indicator, and optional Hype badge.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Hype: Displays a stylized saffron-colored Hype badge with flame icon.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Wraps and renders the leaderboard header and a list of ArtistRow components.
Renders the desktop column headers for the leaderboard grid.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Rank: Shows an up, down, or neutral indicator based on reach score shift.
frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSampl: Provides sample artist leaderboard data including ranks, scores, and trending flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes and applies global styles including a mandala background utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistLeaderboardPage: Renders the Artist Leaderboard page with themed corner ornaments, header text, and the Leaderboard component using sample data.
frontend/src/types/leaderboard.ts: Exports the Artist interface describing leaderboard artist properties.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to theme CSS variables, extended utilities, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Captures the projectâ€™s current UI direction, requirements, and design notes for the updated Artist Leaderboard.
